00105                 protected function initialize()
00106                 {
00107                         $classname = get_class($this);
00108                         $this->name = strtolower(substr($classname, 0, strpos($classname, "Controller")));
00109                         if (isset($_REQUEST['action']) && !empty($_REQUEST['action']))
00110                         {
00111                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $_REQUEST['action'])))
00112                                 {
00113                                         $this->action = $_REQUEST['action'];
00114                                 }
00115                                 else
00116                                 {
00117                                         $this->unknown_action();
00118                                 }
00119                         }
00120                         else
00121                         {
00122                                 $this->action = 'index';
00123                         }
00124                                 
00125                         $this->title = "EmeRails";
00126                 }

00174                 protected function before_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00175                 {
00176                         if (is_array($filter))
00177                         {
00178                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00179                                 {
00180                                         $this->before_filter($f, $params);
00181                                 }
00182                                 return;
00183                         }
00184                         $this->before_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00185                 }
00186 
00217                 protected function after_filter($filter, $params = NULL)
00218                 {
00219                         if (is_array($filter))
00220                         {
00221                                 foreach ($filter as $f)
00222                                 {
00223                                         $this->after_filter($f, $params);
00224                                 }
00225                                 return;
00226                         }
00227                         $this->after_filters[] = array($filter, $params);
00228                 }
00229 
00239                 private function filter_applicable($conditions)
00240                 {                       
00241                         if (is_array($conditions))
00242                         {
00243                                 // If an 'except' key exists, check that the action is not included
00244                                 if (array_key_exists('except', $conditions))
00245                                 {
00246                                         $except = $conditions['except'];
00247                                         if (is_array($except))
00248                                         {
00249                                                 return !in_array($this->action, $except);
00250                                         }
00251                                         else if ($except != $this->action)
00252                                         {
00253                                                 return TRUE;
00254                                         }
00255                                 }
00256                                 // If an 'only' key exists, check that the action is included
00257                                 else if (array_key_exists('only', $conditions))
00258                                 {
00259                                         $only = $conditions['only'];
00260                                         if (is_array($only))
00261                                         {
00262                                                 return in_array($this->action, $only);
00263                                         }
00264                                         else if ($only == $this->action)
00265                                         {
00266                                                 return TRUE;
00267                                         }
00268                                 }
00269                                 return FALSE;
00270                         }
00271                         return TRUE;
00272                 }
00273                 
00285                 protected function caches_page($page)
00286                 {

00288                         {

00292                                 }
00293                                 return;
00294                         }
00295                         $this->pages_cached[] = $page;
00296                 }

00341                 protected function cached_page_filename()
00342                 {
00343                         $lang = isset($_COOKIE['hl']) ? $_COOKIE['hl'] : 'en';
00344                         $id = isset($_REQUEST['id']) ? "@{$_REQUEST['id']}" : '';
00345                         $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../caches/{$this->name}/{$this->action}{$id}-{$lang}.cached";
00346                         return $cachefile;
00347                 }

00355                 protected function expire_cached_page($params)
00356                 {
00357                         $controller = isset($params['controller']) ? $params['controller'] : $this->name;
00358                         $action = isset($params['action']) ? $params['action'] : $this->action;
00359                         $id = isset($params['id']) ? "@{$params['id']}" : '';
00360                         
00361                         $langs = Localization::$languages;
00362                         
00363                         foreach ($langs as $lang)
00364                         {
00365                                 $cachefile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../caches/{$controller}/{$action}{$id}-{$lang}.cached";
00366                                 @unlink($cachefile);
00367                         }
00368                 }

00383                 protected function redirect_to($params)
00384                 {
00385                         if (is_array($params))
00386                         {
00387                                 $URL = sprintf("http://%s%s%s",
00388                                         $_SERVER["HTTP_HOST"],
00389                                         $this->url_to($params),
00390                                         isset($params['query_string']) && !empty($params['query_string']) ? "?{$params['query_string']}" : '');
00391                                 if (!isset($params['after']))
00392                                 {
00393                                         $this->response->add_header("Location", $URL);
00394                                         $this->response->flush();
00395                                 }
00396                                 else
00397                                 {
00398                                         $this->add_meta_header(array('http_equiv' => 'refresh',
00399                                                 'content' => "{$params['after']};url={$URL}"));
00400                                 }
00401                         }
00402                         else
00403                         {
00404                                 $this->response->add_header("Location", $params);
00405                                 $this->response->flush();
00406                         }
00407                 }

00419                 protected function redirect_to_referrer($or_else = NULL)
00420                 {
00421                         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']))
00422                         {
00423                                 $this->redirect_to($_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']);
00424                         }
00425                         else if (!empty($or_else))
00426                         {
00427                                 $this->redirect_to($or_else);
00428                         }
00429                 }

00431                 public function add_meta_header($params)
00432                 {
00433                         if (!$this->headers)
00434                         {
00435                                 $this->headers = array();
00436                         }
00437                         if (isset($params['http_equiv']))
00438                         {
00439                                 $this->headers[] = "<meta http-equiv=\"{$params['http_equiv']}\" content=\"{$params['content']}\" />";
00440                         }
00441                         else
00442                         {
00443                                 $this->headers[] = "<meta name=\"{$params['name']}\" content=\"{$params['content']}\" />";
00444                         }
00445                 }

00463                 public function link_to($text, $params = array())
00464                 {
00465                         $params['href'] = isset($params['href']) ?
00466                                 $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00467                         
00468                         unset($params['action']);
00469                         unset($params['controller']);
00470                         unset($params['id']);
00471                         unset($params['query_string']);
00472                         
00473                         print a($text, $params);
00474                 }

00489                 public function link_to_remote($text, $params = array())
00490                 {
00491                         $params['href'] = !empty($params['href']) ? $params['href'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00492                         $params['remote_url'] = !empty($params['remote_url']) ? $params['remote_url'] : $this->make_relative_url($params);
00493                         // Ajax magic
00494                         $params['onclick'] = "$('#{$params['target']}').html('<div class=\"loading\"><span>" . l('Loading...') . "</span></div>').load('{$params['remote_url']}'); return false";
00495                         
00496                         unset($params['action']);
00497                         unset($params['controller']);
00498                         unset($params['id']);
00499                         unset($params['target']);
00500                         unset($params['remote_url']);
00501                         
00502                         print a($text, $params);
00503                 }

00530                 function url_to_myself($relative = TRUE)
00531                 {
00532                         $url = $this->url_to(array('action' => $this->action, 'id' => @$_REQUEST['id']));
00533                         return $relative ?
00534                                 $url :
00535                                 sprintf('http://%s%s%s',
00536                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00537                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00538                                         $url);
00539                 }

00557                 public function make_relative_url($params)
00558                 {
00559                         $controller = (!isset($params['controller']) || empty($params['controller'])) ?
00560                                 $this->name : $params['controller'];
00561                         $type = (isset($params['type']) && !empty($params['type'])) ?
00562                                 $params['type'] : 'html';
00563                         if (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action']))
00564                         {
00565                                 if (isset($params['id']) && !empty($params['id']))
00566                                 {
00567                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s/%s',
00568                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00569                                                 $controller,
00570                                                 $params['action'],
00571                                                 $params['id']);
00572                                 }
00573                                 else
00574                                 {
00575                                         $href = sprintf('%s%s/%s.%s',
00576                                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00577                                                 $controller,
00578                                                 $params['action'],
00579                                                 $type);                                 
00580                                 }
00581                         }
00582                         else
00583                         {
00584                                 $href = sprintf('%s%s/index.%s',
00585                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00586                                         $controller,
00587                                         $type);                         
00588                         }
00589                         if (isset($params['query_string']))
00590                         {
00591                                 $href .= "?{$params['query_string']}";
00592                         }
00593                         if (isset($params['hash']))
00594                         {
00595                                 $href .= "#{$params['hash']}";
00596                         }
00597                         return $href;
00598                 }
00599                 
00623                 public function render($params)
00624                 {
00625                         if ($this->rendered)
00626                         {
00627                                 return;
00628                         }
00629                         // Initialize rendered content
00630                         $rendered = NULL;
00631                         if ($params === NULL)
00632                         {
00633                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00634                         }
00635                         else if (isset($params['partial']))
00636                         {
00637                                 // Get part file
00638                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/{$this->name}/_{$params['partial']}.php";
00639                                 
00640                                 // Connect main object
00641                                 if (isset($params['object']))
00642                                 {
00643                                         eval("\${$params['partial']} = \$params['object'];");
00644                                 }
00645                                 else
00646                                 {
00647                                         eval("if (isset(\$this->{$params['partial']})) \${$params['partial']} = \$this->{$params['partial']};");
00648                                 }
00649                                 
00650                                 // Start output buffering
00651                                 ob_start();
00652                                 
00653                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00654                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00655                         
00656                                 // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00657                                 $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00658                         }
00659                         else
00660                         {
00661                                 // Get action to render
00662                                 $action = (isset($params['action']) && !empty($params['action'])) ? 
00663                                         $params['action'] : $this->action;
00664                                         
00665                                 // Get part file
00666                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/{$this->name}/{$action}.php";
00667                                 
00668                                 // Start output buffering
00669                                 ob_start();
00670                                 
00671                                 // Evaluate and send to buffer
00672                                 print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00673                                 
00674                                 // Get buffer contents
00675                                 $this->content_for_layout = ob_get_contents();
00676                                 // Backwards compatibility
00677                                 $this->page_content = $this->content_for_layout;
00678                                 
00679                                 // Clean output buffer
00680                                 ob_end_clean();
00681                                 
00682                                 if (isset($params['layout']) && $params['layout'] == FALSE ||
00683                                         isset($_REQUEST['nolayout']))
00684                                 {
00685                                         // Do not print layout
00686                                         $rendered = $this->content_for_layout;
00687                                 }
00688                                 else
00689                                 {
00690                                         $rendered = $this->render_layout($params);
00691                                 }
00692                                 
00693                                 $this->rendered = TRUE;
00694                         }
00695                         
00696                         if (isset($params['return']))
00697                         {
00698                                 return $rendered;
00699                         }
00700                         else
00701                         {
00702                                 print $rendered;
00703                         }
00704                 }

00715                 public function render_as_string($params)
00716                 {
00717                         $params['return'] = TRUE;
00718                         return $this->render($params);
00719                 }

00731                 protected function render_layout($params)
00732                 {
00733                         $layout = isset($params['layout']) && !empty($params['layout']) ?
00734                                 $params['layout'] : $this->name;
00735                                 
00736                         // Initialize rendered content
00737                         $rendered = NULL;
00738                         
00739                         // Start output buffering
00740                         ob_start();
00741                         
00742                         // Get part file
00743                         $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/layouts/{$layout}_layout.php";
00744                         if (!file_exists($partfile))
00745                         {
00746                                 // Fall back to default layout
00747                                 $partfile = dirname(__FILE__) . "/../views/layouts/default_layout.php";
00748                         }
00749                         
00750                         // Evaluate and send to buffer
00751                         print eval($this->load_part_contents($partfile));
00752                 
00753                         // Get buffer contents, clean output buffer
00754                         $rendered = ob_get_clean();
00755                         
00756                         return $rendered;
00757                 }

00771                 public function render_page()
00772                 {
00773                         // Process before filters queue
00774                         foreach ($this->before_filters as $before_filter)
00775                         {
00776                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($before_filter[1]))
00777                                 {
00778                                         $filter = $before_filter[0];
00779                                         $this->$filter();
00780                                 }
00781                         }
00782 
00783                         // If the page should be cached, verify if it exists in the cache
00784                         if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached) &&
00785                                         $this->cached_page_exists())
00786                         {
00787                                 $cached_file = $this->cached_page_filename();
00788                                 if (isset($this->mimetype))
00789                                 {
00790                                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00791                                 }
00792                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Length', filesize($cached_file));
00793                                 $this->response->body .= file_get_contents($cached_file);
00794                         }
00795                         else
00796                         {                       
00797                                 // Start buffering
00798                                 ob_start();
00799                         
00800                                 // Call eventual controller action
00801                                 if (is_callable(array($this, $this->action)))
00802                                 {
00803                                         $this->{$this->action}();
00804                                 }
00805                                 else
00806                                 {
00807                                         HTTP::error(500);
00808                                 }
00809                                 // Call render on the controller
00810                                 // This won't have effect if the controller has already rendered
00811                                 $this->render($_REQUEST);
00812 
00813                                 // Get response body, clean output buffer
00814                                 $this->response->body .= ob_get_clean();
00815                                 
00816                                 // Conversely, if the page should be cached, store it in cache
00817                                 if (in_array($this->action, $this->pages_cached))
00818                                 {
00819                                         $caches_dir = dirname($this->cached_page_filename());
00820                                         if (!file_exists($caches_dir))
00821                                         {
00822                                                 mkdir($caches_dir, 0700);
00823                                         }
00824                                         file_put_contents($this->cached_page_filename(), $this->response->body);
00825                                 }
00826                         }
00827                         
00828                         // Process after filters queue
00829                         foreach ($this->after_filters as $after_filter)
00830                         {
00831                                 if ($this->filter_applicable($after_filter[1]))
00832                                 {
00833                                         $filter = $after_filter[0];
00834                                         $this->$filter();
00835                                 }
00836                         }
00837                         
00838                         if (isset($this->mimetype))
00839                         {
00840                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00841                         }
00842                         
00843                         // Finally, flush responses
00844                         $this->response->flush();
00845                 }

00859                 public function render_component($params)
00860                 {
00861                         $_GET = array_merge($_GET, $params);
00862                         if (!isset($params['controller']))
00863                         {
00864                                 $classname = $this->name;
00865                         }
00866                         else
00867                         {
00868                                 $classname = table_name_to_class_name($params['controller']);
00869                                 require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../controllers/{$params['controller']}_controller.php");
00870                         }
00871                         $controller = eval("return new {$classname}Controller();");
00872                         unset($params['controller']);
00873                         if (isset($params['action']))
00874                         {
00875                                 $controller->action = $params['action'];
00876                         }
00877                         eval("\$controller->{$params['action']}();");
00878                         $params['layout'] = FALSE;
00879                         $controller->render($params);
00880                 }

00889                 protected function load_part_contents($filename)
00890                 {
00891                         if (!file_exists($filename))
00892                         {
00893                                 HTTP::error(500);
00894                         }
00895                         $contents = file_get_contents($filename);
00896                         return $this->strip_external_php_tags($contents);
00897                 }
00898 
00906                 protected function strip_external_php_tags($php_code)
00907                 {
00908                         if (($start = strpos($php_code, "<?php")) === 0)
00909                         {
00910                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, $start + strlen("<?php"));
00911                         }
00912                         else
00913                         {
00914                                 $php_code = "?>\n" . $php_code;
00915                         }
00916                         if (($end = strrpos($php_code, "?>")) === strlen($php_code) - strlen("?>"))
00917                         {
00918                                 $php_code = substr($php_code, 0, strrpos($php_code, "?>"));
00919                         }
00920                         else
00921                         {
00922                                 $php_code = $php_code . "\n<?php\n";
00923                         }
00924                         return $php_code;
00925                 }

00945                 public function flush_headers()
00946                 {
00947                         if (count($this->headers) > 0)
00948                         {
00949                                 echo "\t\t" . implode("\r\n\t\t", $this->headers) . "\r\n";
00950                         }
00951                 }

00957                 private function abort_and_flush()
00958                 {
00959                         ob_end_flush();
00960                         exit();
00961                 }

01005                 protected function compress()
01006                 {
01007                         if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING']) &&
01008                                 preg_match("/(x-gzip|gzip)/", $_SERVER['HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING'], $matches))
01009                         {
01010                                 $this->response->body = gzencode($this->response->body, 9);
01011                                 $this->response->add_header('Content-Encoding', $matches[1]);
01012                         }
01013                 }
01014         }
